description:
Unit 17 Going to different places

【课文内容】

forest 森林
jungle 丛林
lake 湖泊
plant 植物
island 岛屿
mountain 山
waterfall 瀑布
river 河流
village 村庄
countryside 乡村
field 田
bank 河岸
zoo 公园
library 图书馆
park 公园
hospital 医院
supermarket 超市
cinema 电影院
-Where are you going now?
-你现在想要去哪里？
-I'm going to the zoo.
-我想去动物园。
-Where would you like to go in the holiday then?
-假期你想去哪里？
-I'd like to go to the countryside.
-我想去乡村。

【听读演】

Paul, where did you go on the holiday?
保罗，你假期去了哪里？
Oh, I went to many places.
哦，我去了很多地方。
Did you go to Huang Mountain?
你有去黄山吗？
Yes, I did. I also went to Hainan Island.
是的，我去了。我也去了海南岛。
That's great. What other places did you go to?
太棒了。你还去了其他地方吗？
I went to the zoo after I come back.
我回来之后去了动物园。
I'm sure you had a good time.
我确定你有一个好时光。
That's right.
是的。

【听读重复】

Mother Teresa is a nun.
特瑞沙是一个修女。
She went to India to have her holiday.
她在印度度过了她的假日。
But when she got there, she was surprised to see many poor people, so she stayed there.
但是当她去那时，她很惊奇看见许多的穷人，所以她就呆在那了。
She saw the life of these poor people was very hard.
她看家那些穷人的生活非常艰苦。
So she started up a new schools and hospitals for them.
所以她为他们新建了一所学校和医院。
Her work with homeless and hungry people has made her a very famous person.
她和无家可归的人以及饥饿的人们一起工作，这使得她成为了一个非常著名的人。

【唱唱跳跳】

It's a world of laughter
这是一个微笑的世界
-A world of tears
-一个眼泪的世界
It's a world of hopes
这是一个希望的世界
-And a world of fears
-一个害怕的世界
There's so much that we share
有太多我们分享的东西
-That it's time we're aware
-那是我们意识到的时间
It's a small world after all
这毕竟是一个小小的世界
There is just one moon
只有一个月亮
-And one golden sun
-一个金色的太阳
And a smile means
一个微笑意味着
-Friendship to everyone
-对每个人的友谊
Though the mountains divide
即使山被划分
-And the oceans are wide
-海洋很宽广
It's a small world after all
这毕竟是一个小小的世界
It's a small world after all
这毕竟是一个小小的世界
It's a small world after all
这毕竟是一个小小的世界
It's a small world after all
这毕竟是一个小小的世界
It's a small, small world
它是一个很小，很小的世界
